context_of_use: This use case allows customers to search, browse categories, view product details, and add items to their shopping cart within the e-commerce platform.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to easily find and purchase products
description: Enable customers to search, browse categories, view product details, and add items to their shopping cart.
triggering_event: Customer initiates a product browsing session.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: Customer has successfully added products to the shopping cart.
assumptions: The customer has an active account and is logged in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays products in the selected category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays search results matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System displays detailed information about the selected product.
4. Customer adds products to cart → System confirms the product has been added to the shopping cart.
